metadata.title: Tuesday, 1st October, 2019
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to procure fish cages for fish farmers in Nalolo District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) when the tarring of the following roads in Bahati Parliamentary Constituency will commence:
(b) what the total cost of the project is; and
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
